title: Chris Colohan from Burning Love/Cursed/Left For Dead
itunes:title: Chris Colohan from Burning Love/Cursed/Left For Dead
description:
The first interview I was pretty nervous to conduct as Chris Colohan is one of my favorite vocalists of all time. Chris was gracious enough to sit down with me at The Fest and talk about his upbringing, religion and the fire that keeps things alive for him with music and touring.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
